name: Shitty Mobile Game (PC Edition)
description:
It's the shittiest game in the world. Enjoy or don't I don't care. Good luck, falling off the edge does nothing. This is purposefully shitty so don't ask me to fix this. 

Press the X to leave advertisements, they aren't my videos and I have no clue where they're from. They are just there to increase the shittiness and I am not paid because of them.

RATINGS

  1. looks like shit, is shit, is a pc version, 10/10

a game that keeps its promises, a true masterpiece ~ Elry
